Entry.Name: TEXT_VICTORY_POINTS
Entry.zHelp: Victory from acquiring the target number of VPs.

Entry.Name: TEXT_VICTORY_DOUBLE
Entry.zHelp: Victory from acquiring twice as many VPs as any other Nation. (Must also have at least half the target number of VPs. Only possible for Humans.)

Entry.Name: TEXT_VICTORY_TIME
Entry.zHelp: Victory from having the most VPs at the end of 200 Years.

Entry.Name: TEXT_VICTORY_CONQUEST
Entry.zHelp: Victory from conquering all other Nations.
